mapper.insert: insert into bobo.question (questionSetId, title, type, answer, score) value (#{questionSetId}, #{title}, 0, #{answer}, #{score});

insert into bobo.question (questionSetId, title, type, choice1, choice2, choice3, choice4, answer, score) value (#{questionSetId}, #{title}, 1, #{choice1}, #{choice2}, #{choice3}, #{choice4}, #{answer}, #{score});
mapper.update: update bobo.question set questionSetId = #{questionSetId}, title = #{title}, type = #{type}, choice1 = #{choice1}, choice2 = #{choice2}, choice3 = #{choice3}, choice4 = #{choice4}, answer = #{answer}, score = #{score} where id = #{id};
